item.title: Maya Test Page
item.description: maya is markdown preprocessor for static site generator. view embed file. import json x = json.dumps({ 'name': 'maya', 'repo': 'github.com/if1live/maya', }, indent=2) print(x) embed with line range. x = json.dumps({ 'name': 'maya', 'repo': 'github.com/if1live/maya', }, indent=2) execute $ python sample.py { "repo": "github.com/if1live/maya", "name": "maya" } gist youtube
